hero_title: Skip the infrastructure. Ship your features.
hero_subtitle: A production-ready monorepo with auth, multi-tenant, RBAC, and an integrated AI team. Build your SaaS in minutes, not months.
features_subtitle: From authentication to AI-powered development, all the infrastructure is handled so you can focus on your business.
feature_fullstack_desc: TanStack Start frontend with NestJS + Fastify backend, all in a single monorepo powered by TurboRepo.
feature_auth_desc: Better Auth with email/password, OAuth providers, and session management. Ready out of the box.
feature_multitenant_desc: Row-Level Security on PostgreSQL. Organization hierarchy with complete tenant isolation.
feature_rbac_desc: Fine-grained RBAC with roles and permissions. Control access at every level of your application.
feature_typesafe_desc: Shared types across frontend and backend. Strict TypeScript everywhere, catch bugs before they ship.
feature_monorepo_desc: TurboRepo with shared packages for UI, config, and types. One codebase, maximum reuse.
feature_i18n_desc: Paraglide JS for compile-time i18n. Type-safe translations with zero runtime overhead.
feature_ai_desc: Integrated AI team with Claude Code. Specs, reviews, and implementation — all AI-assisted.
ai_subtitle: Two categories of AI agents work alongside you to build and operate your SaaS.
ai_cli_note: Universal CLI generated from OpenAPI specs — any AI or human can interact with your API.
dx_subtitle: Strong conventions and strict quality gates so you can move fast with confidence.
dx_tdd_desc: Tests before code, always. Vitest for unit & integration, Playwright for E2E.
dx_quality_desc: Lint, types, tests, coverage, and review — all required before merge.
dx_docs_desc: MDX documentation in the repo. API docs auto-generated from OpenAPI.
dx_tooling_desc: Biome for linting & formatting. Bun for blazing-fast builds.
cta_subtitle: Clone the repo and ship your first feature in under 5 minutes.
auth_reset_password_desc: Enter your email to receive a reset link
auth_toast_error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
auth_check_email_verify: Check your email to verify your account.
auth_check_email_reset: Check your email for a password reset link.
auth_check_email_magic_link: Check your email for a magic link.
